thread.title: Mr Adam Gibson
thread.title_full: Great British Meat Co. reviewed by Mr Adam Gibson

author: Mr Adam Gibson
title: Mr Adam Gibson
text:
I only order from TGBMC when I get an email about offers. I then buy what is on offer and sometimes top up with quantities of full price products to get to the free delivery amount.
I have ordered bavette steak, chicken breasts, chicken fillets and beef shin. They have all been excellent. Only thing that has been less than perfect has that some of the shin has been more sinewy than I have bought anywhere else and this has been off putting to some of the family but this is the exception rather than the norm so still a resounding 5 stars from me.
